notice.summary: Applications invited from eligible candidates for admission to the Kokborok Certificate Course (2 semesters) at NIT Agartala.

eligibility.minimum_qualification: H.S. (10+2) pass with at least 40% marks
eligibility.selection_basis: Merit based on H.S. (10+2) marks and higher degrees if applicable; entrance exam may be conducted for external applicants only

application.submission: Application Form (Annexure I) must be submitted to the office of the Coordinator, CRTD

mode: Demand Draft in favor of 'REGISTRAR, NIT AGARTALA', payable at SBI, NIT Agartala Branch
Online transfer to Institute A/c. No. 30369892838
fee.receipt: Payment receipt must be submitted along with the application form

general_instructions: Association with unlawful organizations is forbidden
Applicants must submit true copies of certificates and mark sheets, duly attested
Blood group of the applicant to be mentioned in the application form
documents_required: Certificates of all examinations passed (starting from High School/10th standard)
Self-attested copy of SC/ST/OBC certificate (if applicable)

fields: Educational Qualifications (School/College, Degree, Subjects, Marks, Year)
Declaration by the Applicant (affirming correctness of information and adherence to rules)
office_use: Institute Registration No. and Roll No.
Admission confirmed by Admission Committee and Dean (Academic)

approvals.issued_by: Dr. Deb Dulal Tripura, Professor & Coordinator, Centre for Rural and Tribal Development
copy_to: PS to the Director, NIT Agartala
